title: Long Gone and Return
itunes:title: Long Gone and Return
description:
I'm in love with a man who loves me. We've been dating for 14 months. However, four months ago I decided to further my career and take a job 3000 miles away. I made sure to let my boyfriend know that I was not leaving him, but trying to obtain a better life for me and my daughter. Well he was devastated...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
